thread.section_title: Reid Cycles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reid Cycles | reidcycles.com.au
thread.title: steve Gould
thread.title_full: Reid Cycles reviewed by steve Gould

author: steve Gould
title: steve Gould
text:
The bike i wanted was unavailable, but i settled for another. It was a last minute birthday present which arrived on time and in good condition. The manual for assembly was a bit lacking in specifics. Managed to get it together just fine though. I would recommend Reid to others for sure.
Some online reviews i read said that Reid cycles are a bit fragile and can break easily. I just hope my wife doesn't " feel the need... the need for speed!" ( on her vintage ladies bike :D)
overall 4 outta 5
